styles.content: @keyframes keys{0%{border-color:#684414 #684414 transparent transparent}25%{border-color:#0077be #0077be transparent transparent}50%{border-color:#c0edff #c0edff transparent transparent}75%{border-color:#e25822 #e25822 transparent transparent}100%{border-color:#684414 #684414 transparent transparent}}*{margin:0;padding:0}html,body{width:100%;height:100%;font-size:1.5vw}.wrapper{width:100%;height:100%;position:relative;background:#e25822;background-image:repeating-linear-gradient(45deg,transparent 0,transparent 28px,rgba(0,0,0,.02) 28px,rgba(0,0,0,.02) 30px,transparent 30px),repeating-linear-gradient(-45deg,transparent 0,transparent 28px,rgba(0,0,0,.02) 28px,rgba(0,0,0,.02) 30px,transparent 30px)}.element{width:35vw;height:10vw;padding:5%;border:10px solid #fff;color:#fff;font:5em Verdana,sans-serif;line-height:1.3em;text-transform:uppercase;text-align:center;top:0;right:0;bottom:0;left:0;position:absolute;margin:auto}.corner-indicator{animation:keys 5s ease-in-out;animation-iteration-count:infinite;position:absolute;width:0;height:0;top:0;right:0;border-width:25px;border-style:solid;border-color:rgba(55,155,255,1) rgba(55,155,255,1) transparent transparent;display:block}
